ai_specific_tags.note: Many universities have AI-specific news tags or sections that should be explored
examples: University of Maryland has comprehensive AI experts directory: https://umdrightnow.umd.edu/ (AI & Arts, AI & Business, AI & Data Security, etc.)
Universities likely have /tag/artificial-intelligence or /topic/ai URLs worth discovering

rss_feeds.note: Several institutions offer RSS feeds for automated content tracking
discovered: Purdue RCAC has RSS feeds section: https://www.rcac.purdue.edu/news/rss

tools_used: MCP imageFetch tool for content verification
curl via Bash for timeout/SSL issue resolution
challenges_encountered: MCP timeout issues for some .edu domains (Indiana, Penn State, Minnesota)
